ai_type.name: FullEnsemble
ai_type.description: Hugely varied AI in terms of what its planets are like. However, it doesn't use any niche tactics... usually.

ai_type.name: SimpleEnsemble
ai_type.description: Like the full ensemble in most respects, but minus some of the more esoteric ship variants. There's plenty going on here, but not quite so much craziness to discover as you explore.

ai_type.name: Tutorial_01
ai_type.description: A much more simplified AI that is based around the full ensemble, but just... minus the most distressing stuff.

ai_type.name: Tsunami
ai_type.description: Focuses on sending lots of Waves against you.

ai_type.name: WormholeMaster
ai_type.description: Specializes in sending forces in via Exogalactic Wormholes that spawn behind your defenses.

ai_type.name: Quadratic
ai_type.description: With every normal wave it sends, it doubles the minimum strength of wave that it is willing to send. This tends to lead to waves that take much longer to 'charge' (before being announced), but eventually leads to VERY large waves.

ai_type.name: SpecialForcesMaster
ai_type.description: Gets very strong Warden and Hunter fleets.

ai_type.name: Sniper
ai_type.description: Focuses on long range ships and turrets.

ai_type.name: ShieldHater
ai_type.description: Likes units that are good against defenses.

ai_type.name: Thief
ai_type.description: Steals your stuff, man!

ai_type.name: Zombifyier
ai_type.description: Focuses on turning your stuff into zombies.

ai_type.name: Ensnarer
ai_type.description: Focuses on ships and turrets with tractor beams.

ai_type.name: Turtle
ai_type.description: Heavily defends its planets, but sends minimal waves against the player.

ai_type.name: Reconquista
ai_type.description: Allocates almost all of its resources into counterattacks and recapturing planets from you.

ai_type.name: BarFighter
ai_type.description: Reacts violently to any attacks on its planets.

ai_type.name: Overreactive
ai_type.description: Sends much larger Counterattacks when human ships spend a lot of time ineffectually dying on its planets.

ai_type.name: Ghost
ai_type.description: Focuses on ships and defenses with cloaking.

ai_type.name: SledgeHammer
ai_type.description: Takes much longer to send a wave, but as a consequence the waves are also much larger.

ai_type.name: Golemite
ai_type.description: Uses AI Golems on some of its planets. Painful.

ai_type.name: ViciousRaider
ai_type.description: Extremely offensive orientated, and very keen on raiding units.

ai_type.name: Swarmer
ai_type.description: Rather fond of having lots of swarmer type units, as well as those which spawn more on death.

ai_type.name: FortressBaron
ai_type.description: Defends planets heavily, using extra Fortresses as well as the rare Super Fortress in addition.

ai_type.name: PeaceMaker
ai_type.description: Has far more Orbital Mass Drivers and a few more Ion Cannons than normal guarding their planets, alongside additional normal defenses.

ai_type.name: Royal
ai_type.description: Uses far stronger Guardians, plus has more of them in general compared to normal.

ai_type.name: OneWayDoormaster
ai_type.description: Has many Black Hole Machines on its planets, which prevent most ships from leaving while intact.

ai_type.name: Random
ai_type.description: Picks a completely random AI type

ai_type.name: RandomEasier
ai_type.description: Picks a random Easy AI type

ai_type.name: RandomModerate
ai_type.description: Picks a random Moderate AI type

ai_type.name: RandomHard
ai_type.description: Picks a random Hard AI type

ai_type.name: RandomBrutal
ai_type.description: Picks a random Brutal AI type

ai_type.name: Adaptive
ai_type.description: Cycles between completely random AI types

ai_type.name: AdaptiveEasier
ai_type.description: Cycles between adaptive Easy AI types

ai_type.name: AdaptiveModerate
ai_type.description: Cycles between adaptive Moderate AI types

ai_type.name: AdaptiveHard
ai_type.description: Cycles between adaptive Hard AI types

ai_type.name: AdaptiveBrutal
ai_type.description: Cycles between adaptive Brutal AI types
